Thanks you for downloading "Chrome Extension Template"

Please take a look at the documentation quickly before you start writing your own code. click here to read documentation

Save option sample

The option will be saved in Chrome Storage. In order to check the storage, please install the extention "Storage Area Explorer" and then open developer tool, you will see storage tab.


Send a message to background.js

In order to pass an object from "Option", "Popup", "Content" page to background, you need to use chrome.runtime.sendMessage({}). Once you click on the button, you will see a text 'Hi' on the extension's icon.

To debug the message in background.js, right click on the extension > "Manage Extensions" > under "Inspect views" click on "background page".
